name: sharetxt
description: ### The minimalistic open text box Ever found yourself in a situation when you just have to write something? Maybe it's a blast of creativity and you suddenly have the perfect lyrics for a song? Or rather you just solved the traveling saleman's problem and need to write down the code? Well, with a short link, browser and internet connection, you can! Just hop on to [ShareTXT](https://sharetxt.xyz) and release your inventiveness!
